title: Are Those who die with a brain tumor due to cancer martyrs (shaheed)? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: camel from saudi those who die with a tumor in the brain uh due to cancer are they part of the shaheed the answer is no but this doesn't mean that allah would not erase their sins and elevate their status in genna because the seven types are mentioned so the illnesses that qualify a person to be a martyr are mentioned and a tumor in the brain is not one of them you
